entities.name: Neville
entities.description: One of Harry's friends who is helping to carry a body into the Great Hall.

entities.name: Colin Creevey
entities.description: An underage student who was killed in the attack and being carried by Neville.

entities.name: Oliver Wood
entities.description: A teacher who is helping to carry Colin's body into the Great Hall.

entities.name: Malfoy
entities.description: One of Harry's enemies who was involved in the attack.

entities.name: Crabbe
entities.description: One of Malfoy's friends and accomplices.

entities.name: Goyle
entities.description: Another one of Malfoy's friends and accomplices.

entities.name: Harry
entities.description: The main character who is observing the scene in the Great Hall.

entities.name: Great Hall
entities.description: A large hall where students are gathering to comfort each other after the attack.

entities.name: grounds
entities.description: The area outside the castle where some of the bodies were found.

relationships.description: Neville is carrying Colin's body into the Great Hall.
Oliver Wood is also helping to carry Colin's body into the Great Hall.
